scripts.install-all: npm i && concurrently "npm run client-install" "npm run server-install"
scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start --prefix server
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.deploy: npm run install-all && npm run build --prefix client&& npm run server
